column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Great , you 're back ! "
#Text=Aang says : " What 's for dinner ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " We 've got a few options .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What was that ?
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's coming from over there !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Should n't we run away from huge booms ?
#Text=Not toward them ?
#Text=" Katara says : " An earthbender !
#Text=" Aang says : " Let 's go meet him !
#Text=" Sokka says : " He looks dangerous , so we better approach cautiously .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hello there !
#Text=I 'm Katara !
#Text=What 's your name ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Nice to meet you !
#Text=" Katara says : " I just wanted to say hi .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey !
#Text=That guy 's got ta be running somewhere .
#Text=Maybe we 're near a village ?
#Text=And I bet that village has a market !
#Text=" Katara says : " Which means no nuts for dinner !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey !
#Text=I worked hard to get those nuts !
#Text=Yeah , I hate 'em too .
#Text=" Aang says : " Great hat !
#Text=I 'll trade you some nuts for it .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey ... " Haru says : " Hi , Mom .
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " Where have you been , Haru ?
#Text=You 're late !
#Text=Get started on your chores .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey .
#Text=You 're that kid .
#Text=Why did you run away before ?
#Text=" Haru says : " Uh , you must have me confused with some other kid .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , she does n't .
#Text=We saw you earthbending .
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " They saw you doing what ?!
#Text=" Haru says : " They 're crazy , Mom !
#Text=I mean , look at how they 're dressed .
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " You know how dangerous that is !
#Text=You know what would happen if they caught you earthbending !
#Text=" Tax collector says : " Open up !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fire Nation !
#Text=Act natural !
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " What do you want ?
#Text=I 've already paid you this week !
#Text=" Tax collector says : " The tax just doubled .
#Text=And we would n't want an accident , would we ?
#Text=Fire is sometimes so hard to control .
#Text=" Tax collector says : " You can keep the copper ones .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Nice guy .
#Text=How long has the Fire Nation been here ?
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " Five years .
#Text=Fire Lord Ozai uses our town 's coal mines to fuel his ships .
#Text=" Haru says : " They 're thugs .
#Text=They steal from us .
#Text=And everyone here 's too much of a coward to do anything about it .
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " Quiet , Haru !
#Text=Do n't talk like that .
#Text=" Katara says : " But , Haru 's an earthbender ?
#Text=He can help !
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " Earthbending is forbidden .
#Text=It 's caused nothing but misery for this village !
#Text=He must never use his abilities .
#Text=" Katara says : " How can you say that ?
#Text=Haru has a gift !
#Text=Asking him not to earthbend is like asking me not to waterbend .
#Text=It 's a part of who we are .
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " You do n't understand .
#Text=" Katara says : " I understand that Haru can help you fight back .
#Text=What can the Fire Nation do to you that they have n't done already ?
#Text=" Haru 's mother says : " They could take Haru away !
#Text=Like they took his father .
#Text="
